discourse_list.title: Uniswap is recommended to do cross chain DEX

content.content: This is a very simple thing for uniswap. It increases the single currency reserve pool, reduces the time cycle required for cross chain, cashes it to the other party in advance, and withdraws a certain handling fee.
content.GPT-summary: The post proposes that Uniswap should implement a cross-chain DEX to increase the single currency reserve pool, reduce the time cycle required for cross-chain transactions, and withdraw a certain handling fee. The post does not ask for feedback, advertise the proposal, or ask questions about it. However, a 3rd party gives constructive criticism and extends the proposal by suggesting that Uniswap should also consider implementing a feature that allows users to trade between different L2 solutions.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
